title: Dead Harvest
description: Meet Sam Thornton, Collector of Souls. Sam’s job is to collect the souls of the damned, and ensure their souls are dispatched to the appropriate destination. But when he’s dispatched to collect the soul of a young woman he believes to be innocent of the horrific crime that’s doomed her to Hell, he says something no Collector has ever said before. “No.” File Urban Fantasy [ Souled Out | Damned If You Don’t | Collector Mania | On The Run ] e-book 978-0-85766-219-4From the Paperback edition.
author: Chris F. Holm
